description.value:
This rough metal staff is pitted and sandblasted, with thousands of nigh-imperceptible sand crystals embedded in its surface.

While carrying the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Occultism checks to identify aberrations and oozes native to the Darklands.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Know Direction]{Know Direction}

    1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Create Water]{Create Water} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Purify Food and Drink]{Purify Food and Drink} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Unseen Servant]{Unseen Servant}

  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Darkvision]{Darkvision} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Endure Elements]{Endure Elements}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Earthbind]{Earthbind} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Neutralize Poison]{Neutralize Poison} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wanderer's Guide]{Wanderer's Guide}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Air Walk]{Air Walk} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Hallucinatory Terrain]{Hallucinatory Terrain} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Rope Trick]{Rope Trick}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Pillars of Sand]{Pillars of Sand} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Veil]{Veil}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

rules.label: Staff of the Black Desert (identify oozes & aberrations of Darklands)

source.value: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands
